map: Map: Here is the starting point. Here you have diffent kinds of shops with different products in it.
selectItems: Shop: Here you can choose the items that you want to buy. To see what exactly you need, please check 'My shoping list'. Be careful, you have a limited amount of money.
payQuiz: Payment-1: In this stage you have to choose the amount to pay. If you forget the amount, press the 'Return to products' button in the menu on your right.
coinQuiz: Payment-2: Here you have to pay the total cost in coins from your wallet.
receiveQuiz: Payment-3: That's almost it. Now, just select your correct change.
